content:
CORS preflight in the 2.5 JPA Example and CLI Server is broken due to the missing prefer header. Pull Request for the master: https://github.com/jamesagnew/hapi-fhir/pull/718
If you want to have a fixed 2.5 stable hapi with CORS here is my 2.5 branch with the fix included: https://github.com/elnin0815/hapi-fhir/tree/2.5
